page.title: 13A BUTTERLEIGH GARDEN PARTY
page.content: On Saturday 7th July a group of us went to a{garden party}which was held at a big house called Splashetts.It was held to raise money for a new St George's Flag for the Church. There were only a few stalls but many people turned up.There was a Cake stall,a Produce stall,a White Elephant stall and a Bottle stall.You could also buy Cream Teas,Peaches,Ice Creams and Cold Drinks.There was a Raffle and although it is Summer they were selling Christmas Cards in aid of the Church.People were also invited to explore a small wood in the grounds of the house.The Car Park was in a field next to the house! Altogether they raised Â£320.Â£15 was given to the Church to raise the flag of St George.The rest of the money was given to the church for buying useful material,and also for repairs.
